short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your canary in the coal mine. Keeping you safe online, by staying a step ahead.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Ever stumbled upon unsettling content online? Canary is here to keep your online experience safe and secure. Developed with real-world concerns in mind, it's your trusty companion for worry-free browsing."

üê¶ What it does
Canary is a Chrome extension that quietly works in the background as you browse the web. It uses the Google Vertex AI API to analyse the content of web pages you visit. If Canary detects extremist content, it discreetly blocks access to the page, ensuring your online safety without disrupting your browsing experience. 

‚è© Quick Start Guide
- Add Canary to Chrome.
- Enable the extension.
- Agree to Canary's End User License Agreement when prompted.
- Complete the authentication process via the Google OAuth popup.
- You're now protected by Canary!

üéâ Thanks
Thanks so much for downloading and using Canary. Feedback, comments, and thoughts are always welcome!
